name: Sir Goodboi
description:
Collect bones and steaks as you fight hordes of monsters!

Use WASD to move and spacebar to attack!

Have fun!

Made with free assets from the Unity Asset Store :D

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/simple-gems-ultimate-animated-customizable-pack-73764
